entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:09 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 09:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: SSE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with flurries at times heavy changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
